$Louden was given a home run when umpire Emslie lost sight of the ball under the fence.

The account says that Wagner singled here, but the box score says he had 1 hit in the game, and I believe that was a double in the 4th. Hinchman's at bat in the 1st is missing from the account, and he had 3 hits, so he must have singled in this inning. Therefore, I think Wagner made an out, and the single was actually Hinchman's.
